SEARCH
Package com.platform.user.api

Class OrganizationManagementServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.platform.user.api.OrganizationManagementServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrganizationManagementService
@Service public class OrganizationManagementServiceImpl extends Object implements OrganizationManagementService
Implementation of OrganizationManagementService that bridges the API and internal layers. This service converts between internal entities and API DTOs.
